text: wlma wasal ma'an "mdyn" wajad ealayh jamaeat min alnaas yasqun mwashyhm, wawajad min dun tilk aljamaeat amra'atayn mnfrdtyn ean alnas, thbsan ghnmhma ean alma'; lejzhma wdefhma ean mzahmt alrjal, wtntzran hataa tasdur eanh mwashy alnas, thuma tsqyan mashythma, falamaa rahma musaa -elyh alslam- rqq lhma, thuma qal: ma shankma? qalta: la nastatie mzahmt alrjal, wala nasqi hataa ysqy alnas, wa'abuna shaykh kbyr, la yastatie 'an ysqy mashyth; ldefh wkbrh
